text: In Dungeons & Dragons (D&D;), the word monster refers to different kinds of creatures. Some creatures come from folklore and legends. Others were created only for the game. A major part of the game is that monsters are problems that players must defeat to get through the game. Many of the monsters have become unique even outside the game. == References == Category:Dungeons & Dragons Category:Monsters
title: Monsters in Dungeons & Dragons
